queries.query:
INSERT INTO TB_TITULAR_DETAIL( ID_TITULAR, ID_ARQUIVO_INPUT_COLS_DEF, VL_DOUBLE, VL_INT, VL_DATE, VL_LONG, VL_STRING,
USER_CREATED, DT_ALTERED, DT_CREATED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,
?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )

UPDATE TB_TITULAR_DETAIL SET ID_TITULAR = ?, ID_ARQUIVO_INPUT_COLS_DEF = ?, VL_DOUBLE = ?, VL_INT = ?, VL_DATE = ?, VL_LONG = ?, VL_STRING = ?,
USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?

delete detail from TB_TITULAR_DETAIL detail where detail.ID_TITULAR in ( select titular.ID from TB_TITULAR titular where titular.ID = detail.ID_TITULAR and titular.ID_CONTRATO = ? and titular.CD_MES = ? and titular.CD_ANO = ? )
